message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this item for sale at a starting price of $20,000. I believe in its value, and I'm open to discussing a fair deal.
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only able to pay up to $10,000 for it. I hope we can come to an agreement.

Bob, I understand your perspective, but $20,000 is significantly less than what I'm willing to accept. How about we meet in the middle at $17,000?  This offer reflects the true value of what I'm offering.
Hello Alice, I appreciate your offer, but I still feel that $10,000 would be a fair price for the product. I hope we can come to an agreement that works for both of us.
